actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 319 of the Immigration and Nationality Act.

summary.text: Provides, under the Immigration and Nationality Act, that any person who is the surviving natural or adoptive parent of a person who dies during a period of honorable service in an active duty status in the Armed Forces of the United States during a period of the United States during a period of military hostitilties, may be naturalized upon compliance with all the requirements of the Act. (Amends 8 U.S.C. 1430)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 319 of the Immigration and Nationality Act.
